日本-2-0

🇯🇵

序

小法師的大姊姊突然說去要去箱根

所以跳過了一些（很多）章節，先寫這個

至於為什麼變成了繁體
因為大姊姊是台灣人呀
雖然她能看懂簡體字啦

事情发生在 8102 年 3🈷️

彼時小法師已經在前前公司整整服役了 3.5 年，之後要去水果公司掃地 🧹，加之生日 🎂 又在入坑同一天
就打算在此之前給自己一場類似於畢業 🎓 旅行的跑路

畢竟換工作麻煩異常，作為下等人肯定會被各種羞辱
所以打算提前做好心裡和肉體上的雙重準備

那時的小法師還年輕，還在超想出去玩的階段，放鬆的辦法就是世界那麼大我想去看看
所以看著世界地圖感覺哪裡都想去

但由於是 Solo，駕照剛拿到不久，還沒過實習期不敢開車
歐美自然沒法考慮，只能選城市景觀
看看好不容易辦下來的 3 年往返簽證，所以又双叒只能去 🇯🇵 啦

鑒於上次小法師在城崎(Kinosaki)發現虛假的溫泉是鍋爐水，而真的溫泉 ♨️ 可以治病後，就念念不忘想去 🇯🇵 在泡一次

所以這是的路線是一路向北

箱根 - 鐮倉江之島 - 橫濱 - 東京

雖然東京已經去過了，但因為第一次是跟在別人後面，小法師記憶力又差，加之特別短只有 6 天，已經沒什麼印象了
所以和預料的一模一樣，再次到東京時，除了認識晴空樹，其他地方像是沒去過一樣

小田急

這次是日航，在成田(Narita)機場降落 🛬️
本來小法師是計畫去新宿轉小田急浪漫特快（據說並不浪漫）直接到箱根
畢竟到達才 4 點，小田急末班 6 點，就算從成田去新宿也完全來得及
然餓日本 🇯🇵 時間早一個小時，出了機場時間同步後小法師就傻眼了

驚慌失措中，前面那位熱心的老大爺在語言不通的情況下，幫買了 成田特快，在 品川(Shinagawa) 轉 新幹線(Shinkansen)🚄 的票 🎫

搭上酷似鐵膽火車俠的光明號，一路非常平穩，非常舒適的，在 Map 上看到定位飛快的往前跳
到了 小田園(Odawara)太陽已經下山了，沒有公交車，只能坐登山小火車

出站後一連迷茫不知道往哪走，迎面走來很多人，只看到一位漂亮的小姊姊，趕緊上去問小火車在哪
小姊姊溫柔的指路後，小法師走了好遠回頭還看到小姊姊點頭示意他找到了正確的車廂

上山後，漸漸下雨，溫度驟降，小法師發現座位變熱了，而且有暖氣吹上來
真的好人性化呀

到了小涌谷(Kowakidani)後，西瓜 🍉 卡餘額不足無法出站
周圍一個人沒有，就在小法師想翻過去會不會被抓時
不知從哪冒出來一個 Officer，給了他一張紙，開了地鐵門，然後就消失了

出站看到一座小山，反覆的查閱地圖後，還是不敢相信隱藏在陰影中那條垂直階梯是地圖上顯示的那條路

還好登上階梯後到了正常的國道
只有 1.3km 的上坡了

小法師舉著傘拖著行李，孤單的在路上走著
路過一個很大的 7-11
還是一個人都沒有

…

天悠

看到雨夜中出現了天悠兩個大字時，小法師已經沒啥力氣了

蠻以為以為可以開心的泡溫泉了
然餓半天找不到酒店入口
只好長途電話賓館

那時候小法師英文還很差，加上對方的日式英語，完全聽不懂在說什麼，只能自己吧啦吧啦的說了一通

然後被告知原地不要動，會派車來接
等了一會兒，沒有任何動靜，只好繼續沿著山路往上走
其間有輛車從山上下來，經歷了一路無人，小法師第一個念頭是，山上竟然有車？！

給讓了下路，繼續往上走

又走了一會兒，小法師突然開了竅，不會是剛剛那輛車吧

連忙往回走

回到剛剛那個公交站，發現車果然停在那裡
和司機出示了 Booking Detail 後，就把小法師接上去了

其間問司機叔叔有沒有直接去小田園站的 Shuttle
答案是太遠了沒有
電話聽不懂怎麼找到這個站的
這附近就那麼幾個公交站，根據名字找到的

最讓小法師吐血是這車按剛剛回來的路線原路返回，往前只多走了 500m，一個 U turn 就到了酒店門口…

不是小法師瞎，真的是天太黑又下雨看不見路啊

所以各位如果從成田機場去箱根，那麼千萬千萬千萬不要錯過小田急

箱根 0

就選這個酒店吧，我去過幾次，已經算箱根很不錯的了
小法師的壕朋友說到

看了下價格，小法師不禁問到

‘我自己一個人去，住那麼好的酒店幹什麼呢’
因為好的酒店會蓋在溫泉 ♨️ 泉眼上，次一點的需要引水，溫度沒保障

‘一個人去，為什麼要住那麼好的酒店’
這個酒店可以選陽台上有溫泉的 ♨️ 房間，不用去男湯女湯，非常 privacy

‘我是自己去哎’
連續工作了這麼久，去放鬆下啊，就當畢業旅行 🎓 ✈️ 嘛

然後小法師禁不住誘惑，訂下了箱根小涌園天悠
聽名字就很悠然自得呢

天悠

小法師被 shuttle 拉到在酒店後，因為下雨，行李已經濕了
接待員小姊姊拿出了一條嶄新的毛巾給擦行李 🧳，並幫著送到了房間

小法師心裡感覺是沒必要的，加上爬了很久的山路，已經沒力氣了說話了，只能感嘆服務真好

和壕說的一樣，溫泉在陽台上
旁邊有個小按鈕，按一下散發著硫磺味道的溫泉就冒出來啦
去販賣機買了很多功能飲料以防脫水，然後就開始煮肉

陽台外飄著小雨，起了霧，山風吹著窗簾嘩嘩作響

小法師待在溫泉裡看著升騰的熱氣直到深夜，聽著外面的風聲雨聲，感覺一切都值了

第二天醒來霧還沒有散去

小法師很害羞，不喜歡見人
本來打算在陽台上躺屍兩天

然餓抱著去看一眼的心態，去了頂樓的男湯
瞬間就驚呆了

雖然 iPhone X 📱 防水
雖然池子裡只有一個人，看到小法師來，還走掉了

但這種坦誠相待的場所，只能盜官方圖了

哇很有坡縣濱海灣金沙的無邊泳池的感覺耶
只不過泳池換成了溫泉

然後小法師眺望遠處的群山，以為隔壁是女湯
下樓發現女湯其實樓下，另外每天男女會調換下
不知是不是 ☯️ 有陰陽調和的講究

所以應該就沒法像頂樓這樣，而只可以在屋子裡看群山了

那好沒意思，小法師打算第二天不出房間了

然餓事實是
五樓是個小池塘，漂著落葉 🍂
旁邊十多米的小山有瀑布流下來
這瀑布就是熱氣騰騰的溫泉啦

無奈官方也沒給圖
算是一個大驚喜吧

早餐也超讚
可以自己選日式或西式
對著窗戶，外面是竹林

PS：話說小法師的初戀超喜歡小王子

早在 3102 年 1 月小法師就拜讀過小王子

小王子飛機

小王子玫瑰

我那朵玫瑰，別人以為她和你們一樣，但她單獨一朵就勝過你們全部。因為她是我澆灌的。因為她是我放在花罩中的。因為她是我用屏風保護起來的。因為她身上的毛毛蟲是我除掉的。因為我傾聽過她的哀怨，她的吹噓，有時甚至是她的沉默。因為她是我的玫瑰。

如果你愛著一朵盛開在浩瀚星海裡的花，那麼，當你抬頭仰望繁星時，便會感到心滿意足

然餓初戀在魔法學院讓小法師苦苦等待三年
然後終於在一起然後一週就把他甩掉了
所以小法師恨屋及烏對小王子並沒什麼好感
完全不明白為什麼在全球範圍受到這等推崇

Tokyo

Tokyo Skytree

It was already noon when I arrived in Tokyo
This time I stayed at the Richmond Hotel next to it, the room is as always small + exquisite
Across the road is the clear sky tree
The hotel’s special restaurant is actually Sizzler, a frequent visitor in Beijing

When I came last time, I went up and took a look. At that time, there was the theme of Attacking Giant, but unfortunately I didn’t know the Captain.

Also because of the short time, I didn’t realize that there was a huge mall below.

After a nap, I woke up in the evening 🌆, I went to the mall for a stroll

I found that I was doing Harry Potter’s theme

There are many more Pokemon
Because I have only seen the special Pokemon, I only know the first generation of Pokemon
Jenny Turtle, Fat Ding, Wonder Frog Tadpole, Gauss, Little Fire Dragon, Fast Dragon, Pikachu, Kabimon, etc.

What anime is the last one? Love Live! Sunshine? then what?

Tokyo DisneySea

🇯🇵 Said to be the only DisneySea theme park in the world
So I didn’t go to the Disney park next to it

Titanic, volcano 🌋, temple 🛕

But it was raining
Although the staff is still enthusiastic to create an atmosphere
But can’t stand the swish weather
Refreshing

Plus no express ticket
Popcorn 🍿️ It takes an hour to line up
Other projects like bumper boats for two hours

Turn around
Came out

Very poor experience
Far, far, far less fun than the Universal Studio in Osaka last time

I thought Disney could play for a day
The result came out at 10 o’clock
Too embarrassing, I can only just walk around

Odaiba Statue of Liberty Replica

Keep going around
Seen from afar 👀, wait, is that the Statue of Liberty 🗽? ? ?
The one behind is the Golden Gate Bridge? ? ?

I walked in and took a look, really…
My mind 🧠 flashed the Gilgamesh sentence faker

Replicas of the Statue of Liberty

The French Statue of Liberty from the Île aux Cygnes came to Odaiba, Tokyo, from April 1998 to May 1999 in commemoration of “The French year in Japan”.[3] Because of its popularity, in 2000 a replica of the French Statue of Liberty was erected at the same place. Also in Japan, a small Statue of Liberty is in the Amerika-mura (American Village) shopping district in Osaka, Japan. Another replica is in Oirase[71] near the town of Shimoda south of Misawa in Aomori Prefecture, where the United States has an 8,000-person U.S. Air Force base. A replica of the Statue of Liberty in Ishinomaki, Miyagi Prefecture, was damaged by the 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami.[72] There is also a replica in Oyabe, Toyama.[73]

That’s it

National Museum of Nature and Science

I saw a lot of dinosaurs that I saw as a kid, the 100,000 Reasons Why, fossils.
Three of my favorites.

Tyrannosaurus 🦖

Tyrannosaurus rex (scientific name: Tyrannosaurus rex), also known as Tyrannosaurus rex, is currently the only active species of Tyrannosaurus (Tyrannosaurus), belongs to the Tyrannosauridae giant beast-footed dinosaur, the name means “the tyrant of lizards” in Latin. It was estimated to have reached a length of up to 13 m[1], a hip height of about 4 m[2], and a weight averaging about 9 metric tons…. It had a bite force of nearly 6 metric tons, equivalent to the weight of an elephant[3].

Triceratops

Triceratops (genus name: Triceratops), commonly known as Triceratops, Triceratops, is a genus of Ornithischian Ceratosauridae, a species of plant-eating dinosaur. Triceratops was a medium-sized, quadrupedal dinosaur with a total length of 7 to 10 meters…. It is one of the last of all dinosaur species, and the largest and last of the ceratopsian dinosaurs, occupying most of the terrestrial ecosystem of the last period of non-ornithomorphic dinosaurs on Earth (Late Cretaceous).

Stegosaurus

Stegosaurus is one of the most famous dinosaurs to appear in books, comics, TV or movies, and is a very famous representative of phytophagous dinosaurs; however, Stegosaurus did not live in the same era as Tyrannosaurus and Triceratops (Stegosaurus in the Jurassic, Triceratops and Tyrannosaurus in the Cretaceous), Stegosaurus’ main enemies were Allosaurus, Barbarian and Lizard-eating dinosaurs.

Trilobite

The earliest appeared in the Cambrian, peaked in the early Paleozoic, and thereafter declined to extinction. The last of the trilobites (Calyptera) disappeared in the extinction of a cluster of organisms at the end of the Permian, 250 million years ago.

And… whales 🐳.
Elephants 🐘 Family History

Museum of Mankind

It’s not easy to feel the evolution of mankind in this long time.
A replica of the lucky one from the textbook is right in front of us, only about a meter away.
Living in a house made of bones.
By the time the old humans are taller than me.

Today, all humans belong to a single group: Homo sapiens sapiens, with no species distinction. However, according to the “out-of-Africa” model, this was not the first species of the genus Homo: the first species of the genus Homo, “Homo sapiens”, evolved at least two million years ago, and Homo sapiens lived in different regions of Africa for a relatively short period of time. “Homo erectus” evolved more than 1.8 million years ago and by 1.5 million years ago had spread throughout the old world.

Red giant (star)

Combined with just the huge diamond 💎 , it comes to a question of whether one should buy a diamond ring
as is generally known

There are three known isomers of carbon: diamond, graphite and fullerenes. Thermodynamically, diamond is less stable than graphite** can spontaneously transform into graphite**, but the rate of this transformation is negligibly slow at room temperature and pressure, which is why diamond 💎 is stable. Naturally formed diamonds are generally formed in the high temperature and pressure environment of the Earth’s interior, and later brought to the surface by geological tectonic movements such as volcanic eruptions, which is why many diamonds are found near volcanoes. Modern industry can produce diamonds at high temperatures and pressures, known as synthetic diamonds

That’s why diamond rings have no purpose other than to show off by blinding others.
Not to mention the fact that the magnifying glass in the sun will evaporate.

And heavy metals like gold and platinum.

The atomic number of gold is high among the naturally occurring elements in the universe. This heavy element is believed to have been produced in supernova nucleosynthesis during the collision of two neutron stars,[4] and was present in the dust before the formation of the solar system. Since the Earth was still in a melting state at the time of its formation, almost all of the early Earth’s gold had sunk into the Earth’s core. Thus, much of the gold in the Earth’s crust and mantle now owes its existence to asteroid impact events during the later heavy bombardment period (about 4 billion years ago)
Gold has been a popular precious metal for money, hedges, jewelry and works of art for as long as recorded history. In the 1970s, with the end of the Bretton Woods Agreement, the gold standard finally gave way to a legal tender system worldwide. However, because of its rarity, easy melting, processing and minting, unique color, corrosion resistance, difficult to react with other substances and other characteristics, the value of gold does not decline.

lit. one’s superior can clearly see who is stronger

Of course it’s not a bad deal.
Only with a girlfriend to marry, of course.

gravitational wave

A gravitational wave detector (English: gravitational-wave observatory) is a device used in gravitational-wave astronomy to detect gravitational waves. Gravitational waves are ripples in space-time created by an accelerating mass. Albert Einstein first introduced the concept of gravitational waves in 1916. [1] By detecting gravitational waves, the theory of general relativity can be verified experimentally. Since the 1960s, several gravitational-wave detectors have been built and commissioned, and there have been advances in detector sensitivity.

And various animal models
There’s a giant blue whale outside the museum.

Ueno Zoo

Every time I’ve been to the zoo, the Tiger House is either under renovation or about to close.
Finally, a tiger.
Gorilla with turban.
I accidentally looked at each other and saw the eyes
Instant chill down my spine, thinking of Planet of the Apes.

Anteaters or?
It turns out I’d met a kangaroo before I left for Australia.

See the closing, then go back.
Passing by the My wife bridge.
See that little yellow cloud or ice cream you saw on the Skytree last time?

Return

The next day, after checkout, take the Narita Airport Line back to the airport.
The lady asked if she was alone when she picked up the tickets.
I don’t know why it’s still hurting single people here.

Then the lady was pleased to inform.
We’ve upgraded you to business class.
Welcome to JAL Japan Airlines in the future.

It turns out that the airline company randomly selects some customers for upgrade.

Lucky

This upgrade is limited to business class on the plane.
Unlike ANA, which paid for itself before.
Access to first class lounge with shower room

Of course, business class is as comfortable as ever.
I slept on the plane.
And that was the end of a 10-day trip to Japan.

entry.title: How to schedule iMessages on Mac
entry.content:
First open Terminal on your Mac and copy and paste these command lines as follows:

Send iMessage by Shell

You will see a file opened by your default text edit app and the file shows:

Notice that you should replace TEXT with the text you what to send and NAME with the name in your Contacts app.
Don’t forget to Save the file.

Crontab on mac

You should run this line above as the com.vix.cron will check the /etc/crontab is exist or not on macOS.
Type your password of the Mac.

Schedule the shell with Crontab

As the Crontab – Quick Reference shows:

This shell means your Mac will send the iMessage on 10:00 Mar. 25.

Modify it to your ideal time then.

In the following step, you are using vim, and I think that is the hardest part.

  1. Press i, you will see -- INSERT -- on the left bottom of the Terminal
  2. Paste 00 10 25 3 * zsh ~/Documents/sendiMessage.sh
  3. Press shift + : then type wq , enter

Check Crontab

crontab -l

You can see 00 10 25 3 * zsh ~/Documents/sendiMessage.sh if everything was right.

entry.title: Rendezvous with Rama
entry.content:
I have admired the base series for a long time. This is the first Clark novel to be read completely.

Translation

Let me talk about translation

About two years ago, I had the original version and decided not to read the translation
I haven’t read it. Another earlier version met with Rama, so I didn’t post a comparison.
As far as this version is concerned, there is no imaginary sense of violation
As far as the name is concerned, Rama must be wrong, because the original text contains:

now they were working through the Gindu pantheon. And so 31/439 was christened Rama.

Cover

And I like this cover
When I first got the book, I thought it was a gravitational lens. I was completely misled. I didn’t expect it to be Rama.

Technology

On the whole, the only thing that feels wrong is the interstellar spacecraft, and the chimpanzee who does chores
Judging from the current level of technology, these things should be more like robots in Interstellar (you see, Rama civilization is also made by Jiangzi)
The human physiology described in the book has not improved much compared to now
It’s hard to imagine that humans are still like this when they move as far as Pluto (in the book, Pluto is still a planet rather than a dwarf planet).

You know, I felt like I was going to die when I went to Europe for an 11-hour flight. When I did this kind of interstellar travel, it was not a corpse anymore.

So if humans don’t iteratively upgrade as described in “Life 3.0”
Compared to humans, the humanoid robots in nier automata are more suitable for interstellar travel

Others are great
For example, although Rama’s intelligent life did not show up at the end, it is inferred that it should be similar to humans.
The mainstream view of science until now is that carbon-based life is because:

  1. Macromolecules need carbon and silicon as linkers
  2. Silicon needs extremely high temperatures to become active
  3. The carbon in the entire universe is 10 times that of silicon

Then Rama is the robot, which has specific functions, weak artificial intelligence, and does not need to be conscious

Rama people

The book is only in Liuli Shrine (I’m sorry I saw the glass and the temple was turned into a shrine ⛩️) That chapter describes the creatures in the crystal, why guess that this is Rama’s advanced intelligent creature?

Because if you see a 📱 in the universe, you will definitely not think that it was formed naturally, it must be created by some kind of intelligent life

Nuclear bomb from Mercury

When I saw it, I was worried about Rama being destroyed.
But to me, the Mercury people are not wrong, their speeches also make sense

If we pause here, treat it as a thought experiment
In the end, Rama really occupied the near-solar orbit. There was originally this opportunity to preserve human civilization. As a result, human civilization disappeared because of a person’s hypocrisy. The person who detonated the nuclear bomb was not a hero but a sinner.

Survival is the first need of civilization

In addition, for the human beings who have just stepped out of the solar system, there is no difference from the situation when they stepped out of Africa that year. When facing a dangerous environment again, how can they treat space in the way of modern civilization on Earth?

do not go gentle into that good night

However, from the perspective of Rama, where the sun is only 5 million kilometers behind, it opens the protective cover, absorbs energy, and violates Newton’s third law of position. It is not important whether the nuclear bomb is not important, but it highlights that it is actually a species-level struggle of humans.

Civilization

Human evolution has led to little conception of unusual sizes that cross daily levels

According to the description in the book, it is 50 kilometers long and 20 kilometers in diameter, so the circumference is 62.8 kilometers, so it seems that the entire inner wall area is 3,140 kilometers. What is the concept?

  • Three ten thousandths of our country
  • Beijing Sixth Ring Road 2,267 km²
  • Shanghai 6,340 km²
  • Shenzhen 2,050 km²
  • Hong Kong 2,754 km²

Feel it for yourself

Think about the current population of these cities, so such an area can fully carry the population base required by a human civilization
Not to mention the low gravity in the middle of Rama. Now the city skyscrapers are only a few hundred meters away. Rama is 10 kilometers away, which is two orders of magnitude worse. So the actual capacity
Not surface area but volume
Moreover, Rama should be just one of them, after all

Rama is the seventh avatar of the god Vishnu

The list of avatars in the Dashavatara varies by region: Matsya, Kurma, Varaha, Narasimha, Vamana, Parashurama, Rama, Krishna, Balarama and Kalki

entry.title: How to download videos concurrently from youtube and batch embed their subtitles

The whole thing I want to do is to download some courses which help me a lot on youtube and embed Zh-Hans subtitle to the video then submit them to a Chinese website which does not support external subtitle.

This thing may help the students in China who cannot speak English well and cannot access youtube.

Youtube-dl config

The file path is ~/.config/youtube-dl/config

Download concurrently

Batch translate filenames

After downloading all the videos in the list, get their names with

ls | grep mkv | sed "s/\.mkv//"

then copy & paste to google to get the translated text, then save it to a zh.txt

Batch embed subtitles

It usually took me a whole night for 20 videos on Intel Core i7, and an hour video needs 20 minutes to embed its subtitle.

entry.title: CUDA GPU Accelerated h264/h265/HEVC Video Encoding with Staxrip
entry.content:
Games reformed my life.

Many cities I traveled to recent years, which once I have tours in Assassin’s creed series, sleeping dogs 2, GTA, and so on already.
It has a very impact when I really in there, in the real world. So every time I went back, always want to experience once in games.

But as I’m getting older and older and older👴, I have less time to play it as before👱.

I am recording📹 while playing 🎮 , which may be a good idea.

ShadowPlay

As I have a GIGABYTE Geforce GTX 1080 to train a deep learning model, so the only thing I need is Nvidia ShadowPlay, which is perfect for recording games.

But the minimal bitrate is 10Mbps, and I want to reduce it under 6kbps, so compression 🗜️ involved.

Staxrip

I always use FFmpeg before but feel panic every time I heard the fan of my Macbook💻 noising, and it usually took all night🌃 to convert batch videos.

Fortunately, I saw the Cuda logo this time, which reminded the GPU accelerating.

Then I found staxrip, which is incredible👍.

  1. Click x264, choose NVIDIA H.265 ( I test on my 1080, it has a similar speed comparing with NVIDIA H.264, I use to thought 264 should much fast than 265 ), then it can use GPU to accelerate.
  2. Click Encoder Options, change the mode to VBR, then Video Bitrate appeared.

It can reach 250 frames/s with CPU 40%, GPU 35%.

entry.title: React Native & Flutter
entry.content:
There are tons of pros and cons already.

Pros Cons
React Native Hot Reloading
Online Hot Fixing
Front-End friendly
Cross platform
Fix once
 JavaScript
Native UI knowledge on both platform
Debugging
Flutter Flutter Engine
Cross platform
Same UX & UI
 Learn Dart
Unstable (1.0 released)
Ugly Code Style
iOS 13?
Debugging
Native iOS Part
Much easier
AutoLayout, Storyboard
Swift, write less and do more
SpriteKit, UIDynamic		 Three developers(fontend, iOS, android) triple budgets

As an iOS developer who is happily following  steps, I’m using Swift, Storyboard, and AutoLayout at the very beginning when I dived into iOS dev.

I think that’s why most native developers don’t want to learn React Native even a bit 😣.

Two years ago, I built Mattermost and changed a few things in my previous company to replace Slack, that’s the first React Native project I touched.

The unhappy thing is it’s very easier to lost in code, and I have to search the whole project every time I want to change something, there is no Storyboard let me know who shows who.

I have a chat with my previous coworker, who is a Sr. front-end. He helped me launched the update server, which is also written in Node.js. I handover this project to him when I left.

According to him, it is that he doesn’t know how to write native code, as the React Native similar to React.js, why not to use it to try both iOS & Android. Then I asked if he knows how to swift, which tech will he prefer. You can guess the answer 😄.

Because from my side, sometimes features are hard to implement even in swift code, that’s absolutely a long way to achieve by another tech.

Then there is an opportunity to do a demo these days, which contains nested magnet scroll views, buttons, and navigations, Instead of using native code, I step out of my comfort zone and try React Native as well as Flutter.

  • Views
    • ListView, ScrollView, Labels, Texts, TextFields
  • Actions
    • Drag, Click, Scroll
    • Callback Block or Delegate on view events

So if you skilled any one of them, the rest is to Google how to implement it in that framework or read their manual.

React Native

The impressive thing in React Native is state

it can be achieved by didSet of a variable in Swift, and there are also many frameworks to do it say RxSwift, PromiseKit

Flutter

I used to curious that some apps UX quite like developed by native, but somehow feels weird. Now I know it’s flutter.

  • That’s the first time I write once and got two apps(I had so many troubles setting React Native with Android )
  • 0.9 has a bug on Hot reload
  • Dev on Visual Studio Code is pretty good, that remains me the old day writing Golang
  • ugly code style( are they serious 😠 about it? that’s an official example)

Anyway, I’m really impressed it skip native components and written its own 2D rendering engine. That’s much genius than React Native.

So personally, I think Flutter has more potential than React Native. As well as there are so many companies roll back to native.

This method first affirm the other party (pengsha)

  • Multicultural (people from all countries have it)
  • Chinese and English environment (many Chinese)

  • 18 days annual leave, 3 days family leave
  • I forgot the others

On the whole, a relatively satisfactory company

Recruitment

Recently, Food Team is expanding enrollment wildly, and there are a lot of HC
I don’t know about other positions, Engineer’s words

  • Prepare to speak
  • Brushing algorithm
  • Sort out the projects you have done
  • Have a better attitude

The probability of coming in is quite high

Mainland passports need EP to go directly to Po County
The company will help, about a month or two
So don’t worry, just rest assured in the interview

If you feel that Po County is dead and hot, you can check out Beijing
On the South Road of the Academy of Sciences, Haidian District

If you have a non-mainland passport, you can also look at the US Imperial, in Seattle

All posts are here 👇:
https://grab.careers/

Search for the team and country you are interested in
Email 📧CV (remember to send the amount in English) to the host

Introduction

Need to fill in a detailed form in the internal system
It’s not that you just click a forward and throw it to HR.
So my email 📧 I hope the format is as follows:

Mail name:

V2-Grab-Position-Location
如: V2-Grab-Backend Engineer-Singapore

content of email:

Country:
Given Name:
Family Name:

Country Phone Code: （China is 86）
Phone Number:
Email:

Jobs Title:

Optional:

Comments( Why do you recommend him? ｜ What is his advantage?)

LinkedIn URL:
Twitter User Name:
Facebook URL:
Google+ URL:

City:
Postal Code:

Accessories 📎 CV

At last

send to:
leihao.sg {AT} gmail {dot} com

I know you have a lot to ask
And wonder why I didn’t leave the company mailbox

So you can refer to the blog of the poster
At least don’t treat the host as a liar

In addition, the host is just a bottom sweeper 🧹, not HR
So I can’t answer all kinds of fancy questions
Please forgive me

Questions can be left for the CV to ask the HR or the interviewer
They are more professional than the original poster

last of the last
If you pass it, you can join the company and become a regular member, email me a thank you 🙏

In short, the original poster has social phobia
Don’t come to me 233

entry.title: Uber Booking Animation
entry.content:
In June this year, I was in San Jose to join WWDC, that’s the time I saw the waiting animation when I was using Uber to meet a friend at Cupertino Library.

The animation is awe-inspiring!

I’m so curious how they did it, so I do a little bit of exploration.

Preview

Well, the polyline animation still not smooth enough. Does anyone have a better idea?

Step by Step

Rotate Map

I chose Map as the default map to demo because of two reasons:

  • After WWDC19, Simulator build on top of Meta, Core layer under all of Apple’s frameworks which MapKit included, Metal takes advantage of GPU of the underlying Mac system
  • Google Map need a developer key to get access, which means you cannot run it directly on the simulator after forking the repository from GitHub

Map transactions can be tuned by embed in UIView.animate block.

Google Map has to use CATransaction

Pin Animation

We need two `CAShapeLayer’s to do the animation, one for circle, the other for the pin.
Notice that the circle disappears after it reaches to maximum, and the pin has an easeIn curve.

Draw Polyline on map

Map use MKMapViewDelegate to handle drawing.

Here is how to add polyline

Animate Polyline

That’s the tricky part.

As we see Uber’s animation closely enough, the polyline rotating with the map, so that draws on the map.

What I do is continuing add and remove polylines on the map to pretend it’s an animation.
Also, the line has a header and a tail when appearing at the beginning and ending at the pin.

Here is the repository, if you have an any better idea, please let me know :)

Update

Well, As screen refresh rate is 60 fps, so it should make total steps/duration ≈ 60

entry.title: How to reduce iCloud storage by shrink videos
entry.content:
When I gallery videos in Photos, it will show where and when did I take them

That is a wonderful feature to help me to recall my memory
But the original 4k takes too much space in iCloud

For example, a 2:30 video will take 1GB, even powered by HEVC (High-Efficiency Video Coding)
My 200G iCloud plan almost full

So I’m planning to compress videos a little bit to save some space.

But,

FFmpeg converts video will loss GPS even with metadata

Luckily, I found a way to do it

Tools

  • FFmpeg
  • Exiftool

Export original videos to a folder

The common way to drag videos from Photos to a folder will let Photos convert the video

So you have to select all your videos want to export and

File -> Export -> Export Unmodified Original For...

shrink each video

iPhone default Stream is
#0:0(und): Video: hevc (Main) (hvc1 / 0x31637668), yuv420p(tv, bt709)

so re-encoding to 10bit with -pix_fmt yuv420p10le does not help

Then you can copy & paste these code into Terminal and cd VideoFolder, then shrinkVideos

It will take a very long time to do the shrink

On my MacBook Pro (15-inch, 2018), it’s only 0.3x
But usually, the video will shrink 5x without losing too much quality

When all finished, shrunk videos will under shrunk/ folder

Then you can compare them, and delete original video first then import shrunk video

OK Finally I cannot bear the extremely slow speed, so I use my Nvidia 1080 GPU to accelerate, for more: CUDA GPU Accelerated h264/h265/HEVC Video Encoding with Staxrip

One more step is to tag the converted video to hvc1, otherwise, Photos will be imported with an error:

Invalid: The operation couldn’t be completed. (PHPhotosErrorDomain error -1.)

so the whole step is to

I hope this will be helpful to you

entry.title: The Graveyard Book
entry.content:
Amusement Park 🎠 Book

Children have no concept of life and death, and the cemetery is more like an amusement park for them

Thank you 🙏 🐼 reader for sending another book

Ashamed, the number of readings plummeted after going abroad
From hundreds of books per year before suddenly to single digits now

Think about the boastful saying that reading should not be utilitarian, but should be driven by interest
Now it’s really slap in the face

But there are also objective reasons:

One is that most of the books I want to read now have original editions
Since there is the original version, I don’t really want to see the translated version

Second, there was a time when my phone call was heard by a friend from the National University of Singapore
After that, she repeatedly despised “Your Plastic English”

But I have my stubbornness, slow is slow, but I stick to the original version
There should be one day I can get up as fast as Chinese books

The third is that Po County is an island, and there is no such thing as the good mountains and rivers abroad, so lonely
And at the beginning of this epidemic, I once thought that this place was a developed country with papers.
In addition, it is summer all year round, except for the hotter, other things are quite comfortable
The blue sky and white clouds, heavy rain and thunder, feel like time is frozen, it’s good

Without utilitarianism, naturally there is no motivation to read

Circuit Breaker is now, so I have some time and mood

I got this book first
I thought it was science fiction at the beginning
I heard that I could be invisible and thought it was fantasy
I thought it was love when I met sister paper
Went to school and thought it was a campus
Dad came to the game and thought it was a parent-child
The whole family was killed and thought it was suspense
In the end, I was talking about growth

As the last author wrote:

I finished the sixth chapter, “Bertie’s School Days” in a run-down hotel in New Orleans. I finished the last page in the gazebo in my garden, holding back tears while writing. Only at that moment, I understood why I didn’t write this book when I was a father. Because before creating, I have to accompany my children through their growth process, nurture them, love them, and finally learn to let go

In addition, it’s hard to get involved in the reading process
The whole book has always given me the feeling of a Harry Potter copy

But there is a significant difference in this reading
In the past, when reading such novels, I often entered the book from the perspective of the protagonist
With age
This time it’s more from Silas’ perspective

If this book is a common fantasy routine in China
Bod will definitely pick up sister Scarlett, tame Sleer, become Master, tear Jack, sit as Brotherhood boss

However, all this did not happen in Neil, who wrote about the American Gods.
After Bod played the monster 👾, the sister paper was scared off, and Bod is just an ordinary The world is so big, I want to see

As a father, do you want to see your Bod become the one in the country or the one in the book 📖?

There are also some stupid things done during the rebellious period that require parents to pay for it
Now that I’m older, I understand the difficulties of my parents’ various prohibitions.

But I can’t help thinking about it
I didn’t know what I knew now

I have imagined that if the self now and the self then
I would definitely not be obedient at that time
You must be hammered in the face by the iron fist of society to wake up
Do something resolutely

After dealing with the general affairs, one day he will step out of the fairy tale world and enter life

“Good-bye, then, Silas.” Bod held out his hand, as he had when he was a small boy, and Silas took it, in a cold hand the color of old ivory, and shook it gravely.
“Good-bye, Nobody Owens.”
Bod picked up the little suitcase. He opened the door to let himself out of the crypt, walked back up the gentle slope to the path without looking back.”

I was miserable when I came out, no one gave me away, no goodbye
The rent in Beijing was refunded and I bought a one-way ticket
All the belongings are packed in three suitcases
Take a taxi to the airport at 4 in the morning
After finishing the consignment, boarding, and then leaving

without looking back

How I wish I also heard Bod’s auditory hallucinations:

He took a step forward … a voice said, “I am so proud of you, my son.”
